emailHint: At least one of username or email is required. If username is an email, this can be left blank.
registrationSuccess: Registration successful! Please log in with your new account.
home_subtitle: Your One-Stop Assistant for Health and Life
home_meds_desc: Log medication info, stock, and history.
home_stool_desc: Record using the Bristol Stool Scale.
home_daily_desc: Track daily habits and one-time tasks.
home_exercise_desc: Log daily exercises, duration, and intensity.
home_weight_desc: Log weight, height, and auto-calculate BMI.
profile_third_party_login_info: You are logged in via a third-party service (linux.do) and do not need to set or change your password.
profile_server_connection_error: Could not connect to the server.
admin_user_list_desc: View, manage, and operate all user accounts.
admin_cleanup_desc: This tool will permanently delete **non-admin** users and all their associated data who have not logged in for the specified number of days. This is an irreversible action, please use with caution.
admin_confirm_reset_password: Are you sure you want to reset the password for User ID {userId}? A new password will be generated randomly.
admin_confirm_delete_user: Are you sure you want to permanently delete user \"{username}\" and all their data?\n\nThis is an irreversible action!
admin_toast_invalid_days: Please enter a valid number of days.
admin_confirm_cleanup: Are you sure you want to clean up all non-admin users who have been inactive for more than {days} days?\n\nThis is an irreversible action!
admin_toast_cleanup_success: {message} Cleaned up a total of {count} users.
